column4: I have worked with the Pierson team for many years. Iâ€™m impressed with the professional team that Jennifer has compiled, they have great communication skills and problem-solving ability that will get you through the tough spots in a complex closing. I will surely use them again as my broker representing me in future sales and purchases.

Baceline has worked with Jennifer Pierson and Beth Pierson on multiple transactions in the DFW area and we are consistently pleased with the results.  Their professionalism and focus is second to none.
Professional, in any field of endeavor, gets the job done. Jennifer, you meet the definition of a professional in all respects. Thanks for a job well done!
